translation.es: BRUNO - DESAYUNO, CENA JUEVES, VIERNES, LUNES

translation.en: ♪ You say thoughts that connect to my mind ♪
♪ We get lost with reflecting your touch ♪ ♪ You're my best friend ♪
You have a nice dog as well.
Bruno, down. All the way down. No, down.
Bruno. You've gotta go down when I tell you go down, buddy.
translation.es: Bruno, debes tirarte al suelo cuando digo abajo.

translation.en: Look at the puppy. You see it?
Hey, hey, hey! Don't touch my dog.
translation.es: Oiga, no toque a mi perro.

translation.en: What's wrong with you? I'm just petting your dog.
Excuse me! She's a human being.
translation.es: ¿Qué hace? Ella es un ser humano.

translation.en: Yeah, did you like that? No, I didn't.
I don't like you petting my dog either, and this is a human being as well.
translation.es: A mí no me gusta que acaricie a mi perro, él también es un ser humano.

translation.en: Stop with the Charlie shit. His name's Bruno. It's Bruno.
translation.es: Ya basta con esa mierda de Charlie, se llama Bruno.

translation.en: His name's Charlie like his daddy named after me.
translation.es: Se llama Charlie. Como yo, su papá.

translation.en: His daddy? I'm his daddy, and his name is Bruno.
translation.es: ¿Su papá? Su papá soy yo, y se llama Bruno.

translation.en: Everybody on the block knows his name is Charlie. I named him.
translation.es: Todos en el vecindario saben que se llama Charlie, yo lo bauticé.

translation.en: - You named my dog? - Come on!
He even looks like a Charlie.
Stop calling my fucking dog Charlie, all right? It's Bruno.
translation.es: Deja de llamar Charlie a mi perro, carajo. Es Bruno.

translation.en: All right. I'll see you later, Charlie.

translation.es: Hoy es viernes de descuento ¿Qué día es hoy? Viernes de…

translation.en: You almost hit Bruno with that thing.
translation.es: Casi golpeas a Bruno con eso.

translation.en: Well, Malcolm, maybe Bruno shouldn't take up so much space on the goddamn sidewalk.
translation.es: Pues, Bruno no debería ocupar tanto espacio de la maldita acera.

translation.en: I got a business to run here.
A business? You call this a business?
You're selling stolen shit out of a stolen shopping cart.
translation.es: Vendes basura robada en un carrito robado.

translation.en: I have you know Carl's cart is a certified vendor
translation.es: Para que lo sepas, soy un vendedor certificado
y tengo una licencia aprobada por la ciudad.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Let's see the permit.
I don't feel like going through the paperwork right now.
translation.es: No quiero buscar los papeles ahora.

translation.en: There's no city that's giving Crackhead Carl a permit to sell stolen shit.
translation.es: Ninguna ciudad le daría una licencia a Carl Crack para vender basura robada.

translation.en: I would prefer you just call me Carl.
translation.es: Preferiría que solo me llamaras Carl.

translation.en: The shit that I smoke does not need to be put in front of my name.
translation.es: No es necesario agregarle a mi nombre la mierda que fumo.

translation.en: What if I called your dog ball- licking Bruno?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si llamara a tu perro Bruno Lamebolas?

translation.en: Now, is there anything that you like?
Because today is five dollar Friday.
Five dollars off a steak. Five dollars off a plunger.
- Five dollars off a laptop. - I'd like... for you to get Carl's cart
translation.es: - una computadora… - Quiero… …que corras tu puto carrito cuando veas a Bruno.

translation.en: off the fucking sidewalk when you see Bruno.
translation.es: …que corras tu puto carrito cuando veas a Bruno.

translation.en: ♪ Passing up on all these ♪ ♪ Gifts ♪
Don't ask me shit you don't want the answer to.
translation.es: No preguntes cosas que no quieres saber.

translation.en: Yeah, nice to see you, too.
No one bought that fancy stuff but you, so it wasn't worth having.
translation.es: Nadie más que tú la compraba, no valía la pena tenerla.

translation.en: I bought enough to pay the light bill here.
translation.es: Compro lo suficiente para pagarte la factura de luz.
Compro lo suficiente para pagarte la factura de luz. Claro que no.

translation.en: Go to the supermarket like everyone else.
translation.es: Ve al supermercado como hacen todos.

translation.en: You know they don't let dogs in there. This is Bruno's spot.
translation.es: Sabes que no dejan entrar perros. Este es el lugar de Bruno.

translation.en: This is not Bruno's spot. This is my spot.
translation.es: Este no es el lugar de Bruno, es mi lugar.

translation.en: You want a small bag of chips?
translation.es: ¿Quieres papas fritas, un jugo, un cigarrillo, un cigarro,

translation.en: A Snapple? A loosie? A Phillies? Some lotto numbers?
translation.es: ¿Quieres papas fritas, un jugo, un cigarrillo, un cigarro, un cartón de lotería?

translation.en: You come here to my bodega.
translation.es: Entonces, vienes aquí a mi bodega.

translation.en: You want some fancy- ass meat,
fresh produce, broccoli, whatever the hell you eat?
translation.es: productos frescos, brócoli, lo que mierda comas?

translation.en: We're not a supermarket! What the fuck?
Come on. You know the rules.
- No dogs allowed. - Come on. Let my dog in your supermarket.
translation.es: - No se permiten perros. - Anda, déjalo entrar.

translation.en: You know my dog. He's not gonna do anything.
translation.es: Ya lo conoces, no hará nada malo.

translation.en: Okay, so if you tell it to sit and stay, it'll listen?
translation.es: Si le dices que se quede sentado, ¿hará caso?

translation.en: Good, then he could sit and stay his ass out there.
translation.es: Bien. Que se quede quieto aquí afuera.

translation.en: All right, Bruno. Come on. I want you to stay here. Okay, buddy?
translation.es: Bueno, ven, Bruno. Quiero que te quedes aquí, ¿sí?

translation.en: I want you to stay here. All right?
You're gonna be a good boy.
I'll be right back. Stay, okay? I love you.
I guess we like the same kind of meat.
translation.es: Nos gusta el mismo tipo de carne.

translation.en: This ain't your bedroom, you know? We're in the supermarket. Come on.
translation.es: No estás en tu cuarto, ¿sabes? Es un supermercado, muévete.

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing? You stealing my dog?
What are you talking about? This is my dog.
Are you nuts? You just took him from me. It's my dog.
translation.es: ¿Estás loco? Te lo robaste. Es mío.

translation.en: What are you doing, kid? What are you doing?
- Who raised you? - I raised him.
Okay, break it down. Do that thing.
translation.es: Bien, hijo, muévelo. Haz lo tuyo.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. That's what I like.
translation.es: Sí, eso es lo que me gusta.

translation.en: - What up, little Charlie? - Everybody on the block
translation.es: ¿Cómo va, Charlie? Todos en el vecindario saben que se llama Charlie.
Todos en el vecindario saben que se llama Charlie.

translation.en: Learn your fucking dog's name, man. What the fuck you doing?
translation.es: - Apréndete el nombre de tu perro. - ¿Qué mierda haces?

translation.en: - Keep pushing. - That's right. Keep it moving.
You've got to go down when I tell you go down, please.
translation.es: Debes tirarte al suelo cuando digo abajo, por favor.

translation.en: You wanna change my dog's name, huh?
translation.es: ¿Quieres cambiarle el nombre a mi perro?

translation.en: You wanna mess with my life?
You have a nice day now.
